title: Add a Titledear
body: Dear riot i is it possible to trasfer my acc to garena server because i am moving to another country that has only garena servers if not how can i trade my account i spent a lot of money on thise account it would be a watse to leave it

replies.body: Due to the way their servers are hosted and run, we're not able to transfer accounts into or out of the Garena servers. Once you're there, you should be able to create a Garena account though.
